serialize.description: Serialize API requests, if required due to API race conditions

tls_insecure.description: Disable TLS certificate checking (for testing use only)

type.description: Type, one of: pie, exploded, normal, stacked

ymax_type.description: Y Axis Max Type, one of: calculated, fixed, item

ymin_type.description: Y Axis Min Type, one of: calculated, fixed, item

drawtype.description: Draw Type, one of: line, filled, bold, dot, dashed, gradient

function.description: Function, one of: min, average, max, all, last

yaxis_side.description: Y Axis Side, one of: right, left

groups.description: Hostgroup IDs to associate this host with

inventory_mode.description: Inventory Mode, one of: disabled, manual, automatic

name.description: Zabbix host displayname, defaults to the value of "host"

proxyid.description: ID of proxy to monitor this host

templates.description: Template IDs to attach to this host

snmp3_securitylevel.description: Security Level (v3 only), one of: noauthnopriv, authnopriv, authpriv
